title: Porcelain
description: A collection of both new and previously published short stories, poems, sketches, and essays, by Jess C Scott. PORCELAIN offers a personal draft of the author's navigation through a world that is fantastical, offbeat, ironic, unexpected, and true.CONTENTS: 20 short fiction, 50 poems, 10 excerpts/essays, 12 illustrations / ~40,000 words
author: Jess C. Scott
